body:
Your issue has nothing to do with poly. You are trying to iterate nn over len(poly) instead of range(len(poly)). However, you're better off using a foreach loop anyway which would make your code look like this

def evaluatePoly(poly, x_):
  polyTotal = 1
  for i in poly:
    polyTotal *= x_ + i
  return float(polyTotal)

polyTotal also must be initialized to 1 because 0 times anything is 0.
title: TypeError evaluating polynomial
